Two users encrypted secrets with RSA keys sharing a prime. Can you recover both messages from 4948013555974164511998661503739100914559040041778993219485192064458996121898567493389561331970917509386161441535931179394521901861700929804940827924851405 and exploit the shared factor?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=6732663676565456753895270287910821679584243871661846413165226764745054739901915986644867589646902080912644270071696267101875089932477704405676478313402121, n2=8242774198657325972585619922105363622392628402263944935918496148468745457900799476674746114741387665067502086932419682549714554198383479796065647426698547, e=4413560934077055939404092825398890372467066572884264109722093181309686607688747677500284316590210823872014476614396085259357061937588260660661760305807231

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ua6cka7g}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 4948013555974164511998661503739100914559040041778993219485192064458996121898567493389561331970917509386161441535931179394521901861700929804940827924851405
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=6732663676565456753895270287910821679584243871661846413165226764745054739901915986644867589646902080912644270071696267101875089932477704405676478313402121, n2=8242774198657325972585619922105363622392628402263944935918496148468745457900799476674746114741387665067502086932419682549714554198383479796065647426698547, e=4413560934077055939404092825398890372467066572884264109722093181309686607688747677500284316590210823872014476614396085259357061937588260660661760305807231
extra_info: p=83394862989826446955446567120029993390191234885406440088768701060907463489467, q=80732354909999572143716630613288847053107865918881664654386931608730595057163, q2=98840311059242139651779044643306639810506984795648291718146436267622704811241, φ(n)=6732663676565456753895270287910821679584243871661846413165226764745054739901751859426967763627802917714910951231252968001070801827734548773006840254855492, φ(n2)=8242774198657325972585619922105363622392628402263944935918496148468745457900617241500697046154780439455738750299218984330033499466576564658737117258397840
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
